scripts.api: npm run type-check:backend && npm run dev --workspace=backend
scripts.web: npm run type-check:web && npm run dev --workspace=frontend-web
scripts.mobile: npm run type-check:mobile && npm run start --workspace=frontend-mobile
scripts.ios: npm run type-check:mobile && npm run ios --workspace=frontend-mobile
scripts.android: npm run type-check:mobile && npm run android --workspace=frontend-mobile
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:web && npm run type-check:mobile
scripts.clean: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "build" -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "dist" -type d -exec rm -rf {} +
